title: Trailblazer League/Guide/Agility

properties.name: description
properties.value: All players start the Trailblazer League with infinite run energy. The only benefits to training the Agility skill are the ability to access shortcuts, quest requirements, achievement diaries, and associated Trailblazer League tasks.

Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Agility training

All players start the Trailblazer League with infinite run energy. The only benefits to training the Agility skill are the ability to access shortcuts, quest requirements, achievement diaries, and associated Trailblazer League tasks.

If the Asgarnia area is unlocked, 10 marks of grace can be redeemed at the Rogues' Den for an amylase pack which is a secondary ingredient for making stamina potions. Stamina potions are needed for constructing the revitalisation pool in the player owned house. Obtaining stamina potions is otherwise very difficult as it requires the Dr Jekyll random event or buying them from the supply chest in second round of the Theatre of Blood.

Weight-reducing clothing, specifically the boots of lightness, is necessary to complete the Temple of Ikov quest but is otherwise useless due to infinite run energy.

Training[edit | edit source]

All players begin Trailblazer League with level 10 Agility so that it can be trained in Misthalin.

Method Requirements XP per hour at

level 99

Area(s)
Gnome Stronghold Agility Course 1 9,250 Kandarin✓
Brimhaven Agility Arena 1 67,000 [1] Karamja✓
Draynor Village Rooftop Course 10 10,000 Misthalin✓
Edgeville Dungeon Monkey Bars 15 12,000 Wilderness✓
Barbarian Fishing 15 48 15 5,000 Kandarin✓
Al Kharid Rooftop Course 20 10,000 Desert✓
Varrock Rooftop Course 30 13,000 Misthalin✓
Penguin Agility Course 30 30,000 Fremennik✓ AND Kandarin✓
Agility Pyramid 30 44,750 Desert✓
Canifis Rooftop Course 40 19,200 Morytania✓
Ape Atoll Agility Course 48 53,300 Kandarin✓
Falador Rooftop Course 50 26,400 Asgarnia✓
Rogues' Den 50 50 Asgarnia✓
Wilderness Agility Course 52 47,500 Wilderness✓
Hallowed Sepulchre 52 [2]

Sins of the Father

Varies [3] Morytania✓
Werewolf Agility Course 60 68,500 Morytania✓
Seers' Village Rooftop Course 60 45,600 Kandarin✓
Pollnivneach Rooftop Course 70 52,300 Desert✓
Prifddinas Agility Course 75 66,000 Tirannwn✓
Rellekka Rooftop Course 80 55,000 Fremennik✓
Ardougne Rooftop Course 90 62,300 Kandarin✓
  1. ^ Much lower xp per hour is expected at lower agility levels
  2. ^ Level requirement increases by 10 for each floor
  3. ^ xp per hour without looting ranges from 46k on floor one to 95k on floor 5

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Area Notes
Stamina potion Asgarnia✓
OR
Morytania✓		 Requires amylase crystals to create via Herblore, or can be obtained from the Theatre of Blood, or with great difficulty from the Dr Jekyll random event.
Graceful outfit[1] Asgarnia✓ Useless, unless required for a Trailblazer League task.

Other weight-reducing clothing Kandarin✓ Weight reduction is not useful outside of non-agility requirements, like the Temple of Ikov quest or to access the Mogre Camp.
Ring of endurance Morytania✓ Obtained from the Hallowed sepulchre. Effect is not useful due to infinite run energy.
  1. ^ Graceful set effect is irrelevant due to infinite run energy granted in the Trailblazer League.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Area Notes
Summer pie Misthalin✓ Boosts Agility by 5. May be obtained with 95 Cooking and 47 Farming, or 83 Hunter from dragon implings.
Spicy stew (yellow spice) Desert✓ Boosts Agility by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Agility potion Misthalin✓ Boosts Agility by 3. Can be obtained Dr Jekyll random event or Herblore, the secondary ingredient can be obtained in the starting region from lobstrosities.
Elven dawn Tirannwn✓ Boosts Agility by 1. Only purchasable Agility boost.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Area Master Notes
Agility Cape Karamja✓ Cap'n Izzy No-Beard -4 kg in weight reduction. Acts as graceful cape.

{{TBL Guide Links}} == Overview == {{Main|Agility_training}} All players start the [[Trailblazer League]] with infinite [[run energy]]. The only benefits to training the [[Agility]] skill are the ability to access shortcuts, quest requirements, achievement diaries, and associated [[Trailblazer League/Tasks|Trailblazer League tasks]]. If the Asgarnia area is unlocked, 10 [[marks of grace]] can be redeemed at the [[Rogues' Den]] for an [[amylase pack]] which is a secondary ingredient for making [[stamina potions]]. Stamina potions are needed for constructing the [[revitalisation pool]] in the [[PoH|player owned house]]. Obtaining stamina potions is otherwise very difficult as it requires the [[Dr Jekyll]] [[random event]] or buying them from the supply chest in second round of the [[Theatre of Blood]]. [[Weight-reducing clothing]], specifically the [[boots of lightness]], is necessary to complete the [[Temple of Ikov|Temple of Ikov quest]]{{TBIcon|Kandarin}} but is otherwise useless due to infinite [[run energy]]. ==Training== All players begin [[Trailblazer League]] with level 10 [[Agility]] so that it can be trained in Misthalin. {|class="wikitable sortable sticky-header" |+ !
